id: scenario-value-scanner-parent-scenarios-educational-lifelong learning modeled and taught by parent
title: Lifelong learning modeled and taught by parent
description: Lifelong learning modeled and taught by parent
content:
Scenario: Lifelong learning modeled and taught by parent
    Given Sarah pursues her own learning and growth
    And she models intellectual curiosity for her children
    When the educational_elohim tracks family learning culture
    Then it should recognize Sarah's modeling as educational labor
    And it should value her creation of learning-rich environment
    And teaching children to be lifelong learners should be recognized
    And the system should honor cultivation of learning culture
    And Sarah's own education should be supported as part of family care
    And the educational_elohim should recognize that parents teach through being
